_header: Many men weened / that he ne ween ne tharf
_description: Four lines (lines 160-3) from the Proverbs of Alfred

BodDig86.Transcription:
Many man weneþ þat he wene Ne þarf longe to liuen
                    And him Lieþ þe wrench Quod hending
BodDig86.Facsimiles:
Tschann,  Judith A.,  and  Malcolm B. Parkes.  
             “Introduction.”

EETS
         s.s. 16 (1996).

             Anglia

BLAdd11579.Transcription:
Many man wenedþat he wen ne partlonge to liueneAnd
                    hymn lyeȝ þe wreuh
